root.title: Suspicious Keyboard Layout Load
root.description: Detects the keyboard preload installation with a suspicious keyboard layout, e.g. Chinese, Iranian or Vietnamese layout load in user session on systems maintained by US staff only
root.author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)

logsource.definition: Requirements: Sysmon config that monitors \Keyboard Layout\Preload subkey of the HKLU hives - see https://github.com/SwiftOnSecurity/sysmon-config/pull/92/files

falsepositives.item: Administrators or users that actually use the selected keyboard layouts (heavily depends on the organisation's user base)
